it.essepuntato.earmark.core.io
Interface EARMARKWriter

All Superinterfaces:
EARMARKIOLogger
All Known Implementing Classes:
JenaWriter
public interface EARMARKWriter
extends EARMARKIOLogger

This interface defines methods for storing an EARMARK document into various representations.

Author:
Silvio Peroni
